<CodeGroup>
  ```python Python
  from notte_sdk import NotteClient

  client = NotteClient()
  function = client.Function(function_id="func_abc123")

  # Generate cURL command
  curl_command = function.get_curl(
      url="https://example.com",
      search_query="laptop"
  )

  print(curl_command)
  ```
</CodeGroup>
